original_text: Behold, it is given to the fire for fuel. When the fire has consumed both ends of it, and the middle of it is charred, is it useful for anything?
korean_text: 불에 던질 땔감이 될 뿐이라 불이 그 두 끝을 사르고 그 가운데도 태웠으면 제조에 무슨 소용이 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: it is given to the fire for fuel.
When the fire has consumed both ends of it,
sentences.korean_translation: 불이 그것의 양 끝을 다 태웠을 때,

sentences.original_text: and the middle of it is charred,
